content: enjoy this **free** tutorial and pattern full tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=iusy1tf3l-a the pattern was written in crochet standard american term materials 4 ply worsted weight yarn i used local brand named eagle 3 5mm hook i used 6/0 japanese tulip hook abbreviation single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet sl- slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet st - stitch chain- chain treble_crochet - tripple crochet - repeat instruction in parenthesis
